name: Culture Ally
description: Culture Ally empowers organizations on their Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) journey through engaging training, expert consulting, and interactive e-learning solutions.
features: Training features engaging DEI topics, interactive exercises, and ongoing cultural recognition.
Consulting offers expert guidance, DEI audits, and targeted support.
E-Learning provides interactive modules and a growing library for continuous team engagement.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Culture Ally: Your Partner in Building an Inclusive Workplace
ShortDescription: Your diversity, equity & inclusion solutions all in one place. Your partner in creating a more inclusive workplace

Highlights.name: Training
Highlights.description: Culture Ally provides relevant and engaging training on DEI topics. You'll find current and relatable content delivered through interactive exercises and featuring diverse voices. Additionally, they commemorate cultural events throughout the year, keeping your team informed and engaged.

Highlights.name: Consulting
Highlights.description: Their expert consultants can guide you at every stage of your DEI journey. They offer professional DEI audits and assessments to identify areas for improvement, and provide targeted assistance where your organization needs it most.

Highlights.name: E-Learning
Highlights.description: Culture Ally keeps your team continually engaged with their interactive e-learning software and modules. You'll have access to a growing library of informative content, ensuring your team has ongoing learning opportunities.
